name: Art Adventures
description: Creative challenges for little artists. Draw, paint, build, create!

challenges.title: Monster Maker
challenges.description: Design your own monster! Give it a name and special powers.

challenges.title: Nature Artist
challenges.description: Make art using only things from outside - leaves, sticks, rocks!

challenges.title: Box Builder
challenges.description: Build something cool from cardboard boxes. Robot? Castle? Spaceship?

challenges.title: Mirror Me
challenges.description: Look in a mirror and draw yourself! Try to get the details right.

challenges.title: Color Scientist
challenges.description: Mix paints to create 5 new colors. Name each one!

challenges.title: Comic Creator
challenges.description: Draw a comic strip with at least 4 panels. Tell a story!

challenges.title: Gift of Art
challenges.description: Make a piece of art as a gift for someone. Give it to them!

challenges.title: Dough Zoo
challenges.description: Make 5 different animals out of playdough or clay.
